valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 3 Feb 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low Sole 980 losing its identity. New low expected FitzRoy 976 by midday tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 7 to severe gale 9. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6, but 7 or gale 8 until later in south.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough, becoming high later in southwest. in northeast, moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, snow. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate, occasionally very poor. In northeast, good.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
21:55 (UTC) on Mon 2 Feb 2026
Southeasterly gale force 8 increasing severe gale force 9 later
